title: Mintly 1.0
author: Cyrus Estavillo
excerpt: Mintly is the fastest way to create high-performing product ads—no designers, no agencies, no wasted time. Upload your product image and instantly generate stunning static and video ads that look like they came from top brands. Our templates are based on the best-performing ads from companies like Nike, Glossier, and Skims—remade with your product, logo, and colors. Built for small businesses, Shopify sellers, Amazon brands, and TikTok Shops—replacing $2K–$30K/month creative costs.
